sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Button, Col, Form, Input, notification, Row, Select } from 'antd'; import { Option } from 'antd/lib/mentions'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Cards } from '../../components/cards/frame/cards-frame'; import { PageHeader } from '../../components/page-headers/page-headers'; import { FormValidationWrap, VerticalFormStyleWrap } from '../forms/overview/Style'; import { Main } from '../styled'; const AddNews = () => { const [form] = Form.useForm(); return ( <> {/* List Advertisement */} , ]} />
